subject: Request: Review and Feedback — Q3 Campaign Public Marketing Materials
body:
Hi team,

Please review the attached public marketing materials for the Q3 campaign and provide consolidated feedback by EOD Thursday, Sept 4. Key areas to check:
- Brand and visual consistency (logo use, colors, fonts)
- Messaging accuracy and readability (headlines, CTAs)
- Compliance items (required disclaimers, factual claims)
- Image quality and cropping

How to provide feedback:
- Preferred: Add comments directly in the attached PDF (Adobe/Preview) or use the linked shared folder and add inline comments to the source files.
- If you have editorial changes, track them with clear suggestions (original → suggested).

Next steps:
- I will collect all input, consolidate changes, and circulate a finalized version for approval by Monday, Sept 8.

Attachments and link below. If you cannot meet the deadline, reply with availability.

Thanks,
Alex Morgan
Marketing Manager

attachments.name: Q3_Campaign_Brochure_v1.pdf
attachments.content_summary: Draft A4 brochure with campaign messaging, CTAs, images, and placeholder contact details for public distribution.

attachments.name: Q3_Social_Creatives.zip
attachments.content_summary: Compressed set of social image assets and corresponding copy for the Q3 campaign (JPEG/PNG and text files).

context_summary: Coordinating internal review of public-facing Q3 campaign materials; collecting comments and editorial changes from marketing, design, and product-marketing teams before finalizing.
